ROCK’X’ -LIGHTING RENTALS

At ROCKX RENTALS, our rentals are timeless, classy, and oh-so-sexy. From ceiling treatments to luxury candling and lighting, ROCKX RENTALS offers top-of-the-line decorations and supplies that bring an extra dose of elegance, allure, and beauty to any event.
